Autoplot method for discharge rating curve tournament

Source: R/tournament_methods.R
autoplot.tournament.Rd

Compare the four discharge rating curves from the tournament object in different ways

# S3 method for tournament
autoplot(x, type = "deviance", ...)

Arguments

x

an object of class "tournament"
type

a character denoting what type of plot should be drawn. Possible types are

  • "deviance" to plot the deviance of the four models.
...

further arguments passed to other methods.

See also

tournament to run a discharge rating curve tournament and summary.tournament for summaries.

Examples

# \donttest{
library(ggplot2)
data(krokfors)
t_obj <- tournament(Q~W,krokfors)

#> Running tournament:
#> 25% - gplm finished
#> 50% - gplm0 finished
#> 75% - plm finished
#> 100% - plm0 finished
summary(t_obj)

#>   round game model            B        DIC num_eff_param            P winner
#> 1     1    1  gplm 4.946249e-02 -1.5222648      6.166183 2.731107e-01  FALSE
#> 2     1    1 gplm0 1.316453e-01 -0.5360443      6.501155 7.268893e-01   TRUE
#> 3     1    2   plm 8.257282e-07 23.5963706      2.993081 4.566934e-01  FALSE
#> 4     1    2  plm0 9.823299e-07 23.3192665      2.917275 5.433066e-01   TRUE
#> 5     2    3 gplm0 1.316453e-01 -0.5360443      6.501155 9.999925e-01   TRUE
#> 6     2    3  plm0 9.823299e-07 23.3192665      2.917275 7.461887e-06  FALSE
autoplot(t_obj)

# }
